headline: Salesforce Grants Equity Awards to Convergence.ai Employees Under Its Inducement Equity Incentive Plan
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, August 26, 2025--Salesforce (NYSE: CRM), the #1 AI CRM, today announced it has granted equity awards under its 2014 Inducement Equity Incentive Plan (the "Plan") to new employees who joined Salesforce in connection with the acquisition of Convergence.ai. The Plan was adopted by the Salesforce Board of Directors in July 2014, in accordance with New York Stock Exchange Rule 303A.08.

The Plan was adopted by the Salesforce Board of Directors in July 2014, in accordance with New York Stock Exchange Rule 303A.08.

headline: Omnichannel Retail Commerce Market to USD 25.2 Billion by 2032, Owing to Rising Demand for Seamless Customer Shopping Experiences | Research by SNS Insider

headline: Health Catalyst Announces Upfront: Market Insights on Salesforce AppExchange
summary: Health Catalyst, Inc. ("Health Catalyst," Nasdaq: HCAT), a leading provider of data and analytics technology and services to healthcare organizations, today announced that Upfront by Health Catalyst ("Upfront") has launched Market Insights on Salesforce AppExchange, a leading enterprise marketplace for partner apps and experts. headline: 3 of Wall Street’s Favorite Stocks with Open Questions
summary: The stocks in this article have caught Wall Street’s attention in a big way, with price targets implying returns above 20%. But investors should take these forecasts with a grain of salt because analysts typically say nice things about companies so their firms can win business in other product lines like M&A advisory.
